_description: Christ’s Appeal from the Cross — five couplets inserted in the Speculum Sacerdotale

BodRawA362.First Lines:
Lysten man lysten to meByholde what I þole for
                    þee…
BodRawA362.Last Lines:
…Al þis I haue þoled for þeeAs þou schalt
                    at domesday see

BLAdd36791.Last Lines:
…All this I haue tholyd for theAs þou schalt at domysday
                    se
BLAdd36791.Editions:
Weatherly,  Edward Howell,
                        ed.  
             Speculum Sacerdotale.
